  • Method Details

    • getTempDir

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull Path getTempDir()
      Returns the path to the system's temporary directory.

      The directory is determined by the java.io.tmpdir system property, which is platform-dependent but always represents a valid temporary directory. Different OS may have different temporary directory, for examples:

      OS Typical Path Notes
      Windows C:\\Users\\<username>\\AppData\\Local\\Temp User-specific temporary directory
      Linux /tmp System-wide temporary directory
      macOS /var/folders/xx/xxxxxxx/T Per-user private temporary directory
      Android /data/local/tmp Device temporary storage
      Returns:
      the path to the system's temporary directory

    • createTempFile

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull Path createTempFile(@Nullable @Nullable String prefix, @Nullable @Nullable String suffix, @Nonnull @Nonnull FileAttribute<?> @Nonnull ... attrs) throws IORuntimeException
      Creates a temporary file in the system's temporary directory (specified by getTempDir()), and returns the created file. The file name is generated using the specified prefix and suffix.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix of the file name
      suffix - the suffix of the file name
      attrs - an optional list of file attributes to set atomically when creating the file
      Returns:
      a temporary file with the specified file name
      Throws:
      IORuntimeException

    • createTempDir

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull Path createTempDir(@Nullable @Nullable String prefix, @Nonnull @Nonnull FileAttribute<?> @Nonnull ... attrs) throws IORuntimeException
      Creates a temporary file in the system's temporary directory (specified by getTempDir()), and returns the created file. The file name is generated using the specified prefix.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the prefix of the file name
      attrs - an optional list of file attributes to set atomically when creating the file
      Returns:
      a temporary file with the specified file name
      Throws:
      IORuntimeException
